name: KIFR Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .kifr extension has been encrypted and renamed by KIFR ransomware . It contains a document, image, video, or other type of file the ransomware is holding hostage. These files have the .kifr extension added to their original extension, producing a compound extension such as .docx.kifr .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
